cards.name: Aberrant Apostle
cards.text:
{1}, Sacrifice Aberrant Apostle: Choose one. This ability costs {1} less to activate as long as Aberrant Apostle entered this turn.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.

cards.flavor: “If it weren't for the weeping and screaming, you could almost believe it was ordinary fog.”
cards.name: Shroudmaker's Domain
cards.text:
Shroudmaker's Domain enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.

cards.flavor: They were never quite the same after that.
cards.name: Across the Planar Void
cards.text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with your choice of X counters on it from among +1/+1, flying, first strike, lifelink, or vigilance.

cards.name: Agency Doorbreakers
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
Once each turn, when one or more counters are put on a permanent you control, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: One person alone can't change the world, much less save it.
cards.name: All In This Together
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token.

cards.name: Amorphous Tyrant
cards.text:
Reach, vigilance
When Amorphous Tyrant enters, another target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
Evoke {G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Ashfeaster Ghouls
cards.text:
{B}: Remove a counter from target permanent.
{3}{B}: Move a counter from target permanent onto Ashfeaster Ghouls. Ashfeaster Ghouls can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: “Even that dreadful moon provides no solace here.”
cards.name: Nightshaper's Domain
cards.text:
Nightshaper's Domain enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.

cards.name: Atal, the Shroudmaker
cards.text:
Once each turn, when Atal, the Shroudmaker enters or you attack with one or more Horrors, you may create two tapped 1/1 colorless Human creature tokens. If Atal isn't a token, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
{2}{W}{W}, Discard Atal: Create a token that's a copy of Atal, the Shroudmaker, except it's 4/4 and isn't legendary. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: “Maybe one of you knuckleheads will get us out of this hellhole, but until then, textbooks out and eyes forward.”
cards.name: Austere Instructor
cards.text: Once each turn, when you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token. Put a prowess counter on it.

cards.name: Bennett Brooks
cards.text:
[+1]: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
[0]: Bennett Brooks deals 2 damage to each opponent. If you have an insight counter, create two Treasure tokens.
[0]: You get an insight counter.
[-2]: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Benthic Tidebreaker
cards.text:
When Benthic Tidebreaker enters, reveal the top card of each player's library and exile one of those cards. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend blue mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
Evoke {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Beyond the Veil
cards.text:
When Beyond the Veil enters, another target nonland permanent phases out.  (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist.)
Permanents you don't control with mana value 3 or less can't phase in.

cards.flavor:
“Donning a cowl won't fix your ugly mug, pal.”
—Darren Hunter
cards.name: Blasphemous Conversion
cards.text:
This spell costs {3} more to cast if it targets a card in an opponent's graveyard.
Choose target creature or planeswalker card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: “I'll be free at last.”
cards.name: Blazing Exultation
cards.text:
Blazing Exultation deals 3 damage to any target.
{2}{R}: Shuffle Blazing Exultation and up to one other instant or sorcery card from your graveyard into your library.

cards.name: Bloodfiend Ravager
cards.text:
Flying, menace, haste
When Bloodfiend Ravager enters, it deals 2 damage to any target. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Evoke {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.flavor: Even with the Agency providing protection, most folk don't dally once the sun sets.
cards.name: Bridgehaven
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. This ability costs {1} less to activate if you control three or more basic lands.

cards.name: Bridgehaven's Finest
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
When Bridgehaven's Finest enters, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as Bridgehaven's Finest has two or more counters on it.

cards.flavor: Duncaster's dead are all too eager to share their suffering with the living.
cards.name: Burdens of the Deceased
cards.text: Players can't untap more than three permanents during their untap steps.

cards.name: Cavalier Deluxe Roadster
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
Whenever one or more creatures crew Cavalier Deluxe Roadster, you may phase out up to one of those creatures.
Crew 1. Activate only once during each of your turns.

cards.name: Cedric Shaw
cards.text:
[+1]: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Mill a card. If you do, you may shuffle a card from your graveyard into your library.
[0]: Any number of target players each discard a card. If you have an insight counter, return up to one creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
[0]: You get an insight counter.
[-2]: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Cenotaph Conjurant
cards.text:
You may cast spells with mana value 5 or greater as though they had flash.
As long as you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, Cenotaph Conjurant gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked.

cards.name: Cephalovorous Flukes
cards.text:
Flash
When Cephalovorous Flukes enters, counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control.

cards.flavor: “The waters glow with such alluring colors. Compared to this wasteland it is an oasis, and therefore I must avoid it at all costs.”
cards.name: Deepdrinker's Domain
cards.text:
Deepdrinker's Domain enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.

cards.flavor: “No time to argue, Simmons.”
cards.name: Charlie Fraser, Taking Point
cards.text: Once each turn, when a creature you control attacks alone, you may untap target attacking creature. After this combat, there's an additional combat step.

cards.name: Chosen of Yhzag
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice another creature. If that creature had mana value 2 or greater, create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token. Otherwise, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
Whenever you create a creature token, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put a menace counter on it.

cards.flavor: Beautiful to behold, but certainly fatal.
cards.name: Chromatic Interloper
cards.text:
As Chromatic Interloper enters, choose two abilities from among first strike, menace, vigilance, trample, or haste.
Creatures you control with mana value 5 or greater have the chosen abilities.

cards.flavor:
“After so many iterations, it's no wonder things are getting weird—well, weirder.”
—Rowena Bishop
cards.name: Chronal Echo
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Until end of turn, target creature has your choice of base power and toughness 1/1 or 4/4 until end of turn. Activate only outside of combat.

cards.name: Corpulent Gibberer
cards.text:
Menace
Sacrifice another creature: Corpulent Gibberer deals 1 damage to any target.
Evoke {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Cranial Glass
cards.text:
Flash
When Cranial Glass enters, exile target card from a graveyard.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Cranial Glass: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

cards.name: Crypt Gnawer
cards.text:
Menace, haste, decayed (This can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
At the beginning of combat on each of your turns, if you have three or more creature cards in your graveyard and haven't controlled a creature named Crypt Gnawer this turn, return Crypt Gnawer from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Crypt of Myriad Fates
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}: Crypt of Myriad Fates becomes a copy of target creature card with mana value X or less in your graveyard until end of turn, except it's 2/2 and a land in addition to its other types. Activate only outside of combat.

cards.flavor: As the flashlight flickered, Ella prayed she had remembered to bring spare batteries.
cards.name: Curse of Impending Doom
cards.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 3 life.

cards.name: Darren Hunter
cards.text:
[+1]: Add two mana of any one color.
[0]: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Then put your choice of a reach, vigilance, or trample counter on it. If you have an insight counter, you may put all of those counters on that creature instead.
[0]: You get an insight counter. 
[-2]: Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent.

cards.flavor: A terrifying reminder of the horrors to come.
cards.name: Deepdrinker's Effigy
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose an opponent. That player creates a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token.
{2}: Target opponent gains control of Deepdrinker's Effigy.

cards.flavor: The powder was to be reserved for desperate times. She figured this was one of those.
cards.name: Desiccating Dust
cards.text:
Choose one. You may choose both if an opponent controls three or more tapped creatures.
• Creatures target player controls lose all abilities until end of turn.
• Destroy target tapped creature.

cards.flavor: “My flesh is a canvas, to mar as you will.”
cards.name: Disciple of Myriad Fates
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Then you may pay {B}. If you do, Disciple of Myriad Fates becomes a copy of that creature, except it has this ability.

cards.flavor: “I tore out the pages but I can still see them, in my mind.”
cards.name: Discoveries Worth Forgetting
cards.text:
Search your library for up to thirteen cards, exile them, then shuffle.
Draw three cards.

cards.name: Dread Sacricolist
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever Dread Sacricolist enters or attacks, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
Evoke {1}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.flavor: “Lay low until the sun rises? Not my style.”
cards.name: Duncaster Nightwatcher
cards.text:
When Duncaster Nightwatcher enters and whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, return target noncreature, nonland card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“At this point I've stopped trying to bury the damn things.”
—Cedric Shaw
cards.name: Duskling Stalker
cards.text: When Duskling Stalker dies, if it didn't have any counters on it, return it to the battlefield with your choice of a deathtouch, lifelink, or +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: “Something tells me this just might work.”
cards.name: Edgar Stokes, Slightly Unhinged
cards.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead, except the additional tokens are named Ingenious Idea.
At the beginning of your end step, exile each token you control named Ingenious Idea.

cards.flavor: “No, no, I'm fine; the blood isn't mine.”
cards.name: Elise Fisher, Tough as Nails
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control gain your choice of trample, menace, haste, or +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“There's more where that came from!”
—Bennett Brooks
cards.name: Empty the Magazine
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has menace and haste.
You may cast Empty the Magazine from your graveyard by paying {3}{R} rather than paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Enthralled Fantasist
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the greatest number of counters among creatures you control.

cards.name: Eruq, the Flamebearer
cards.text:
Once each turn, when Eruq, the Flamebearer enters or you attack with one or more Horrors, you may have Eruq deal 2 damage to each opponent. Then if Eruq isn't a token, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Tap it. It's attacking its controller.
{2}{R}{R}, Discard Eruq: Create a token that's a copy of Eruq, the Flamebearer, except it's 4/4 and isn't legendary. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: After complaints that staring at it too long gave a permanent sense of déjà vu, the Agency decided it was better to keep it under lock and key.
cards.name: Etched Prism
cards.text:
{T}: Put target permanent you own on the bottom of your library.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. When that mana is spent, target opponent loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: “O' Blessed Blade, O' Sacred Dawn; guide our hands and our hearts tonight.”
cards.name: Eternitarian Savior
cards.text:
{1}{G}: Return another target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
{X}{G}: You may put a creature card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Eternity's Eye
cards.text:
When Eternity's Eye enters, look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to three of them into your graveyard and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: Faithforged Pauldron

cards.flavor: You shouldn't have looked.
cards.name: Fatal Decision
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Exile all creature tokens.
• Exile target creature or planeswalker.
• Each opponent exiles a card from their hand and loses 2 life.

cards.name: Fate of the World
cards.text:
Choose one. If you attacked with a creature with mana value 5 or greater this turn, you may choose any number instead.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.
• Fate of the World deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

cards.flavor: Not every stairwell on Duncaster leads to a basement.
cards.name: Feed Those Below
cards.text: Create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token. All other creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Flensing Tormentor
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Flensing Tormentor deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.flavor: “A worrying thought; this hellscape shares far too many similarities with our depictions of the underworld to be a coincidence.”
cards.name: Flamebearer's Domain
cards.text:
Flamebearer's Domain enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.

cards.flavor: Many occultists can see fate's threads, but only the rare few have the power to sever them.
cards.name: Forbiddance
cards.text: Counter target permanent spell.

cards.flavor: No end, nor beginnings; the cycle is eternal.
cards.name: Formed from Twisted Aeons
cards.text: Choose any number of target creature and/or planeswalker cards in your graveyard. Return one of them to the battlefield and put the rest on top of your library in any order.

cards.name: Formless Eidolon
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
When Formless Eidolon enters, create a tapped token that's a copy of target land you control.
Evoke {3} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Fractured Persona
cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/1 and loses all abilities and creature types.
{2}{U}: Return Fractured Persona to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: That evening, Stillmarsh was lost beneath a roiling tide of tentacles and teeth.
cards.name: From Forsaken Depths
cards.text: Once each turn, if you would draw a card, you may skip that draw. If you do, create a tapped 3/2 colorless Horror creature token.

cards.flavor: Clean up squads ensure civilians encounter as few mindbreaking aftermaths as possible.
cards.name: Gasoline Canister
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Gasoline Canister: It deals 1 damage to any target. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: “If you want more, we keep the truly gruesome stuff in the back.”
cards.name: Gaspar Reeves, Occult Broker
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with lesser power or lesser toughness than that creature.

cards.name: Ghost Quarter
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Goremound
cards.text:
When Goremound enters, target creature you don't control gets -3/-3 until end of turn. All other creatures you don't control with the same name as that creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.flavor: “We protect Duncaster from all things that would cause it harm; including the truth.”
cards.name: Grandmaster of the Order
cards.text:
Creature cards can't leave the graveyard or exile.
Players can't cast spells from graveyards or from exile.

cards.name: Grasper of Secrets
cards.text:
Prowess
When Grasper of Secrets enters, choose one —
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Gravetiller
cards.text:
Flash
When Gravetiller enters, exile target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard. If it was exiled from your graveyard, return it to your hand. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.
Evoke {B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Groz, the Nightshaper
cards.text:
Once each turn, when Groz, the Nightshaper enters or you attack with one or more Horrors, you may return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Then if Groz isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of that creature card.
{2}{B}{B}, Discard Groz: Create a token that's a copy of Groz, the Nightshaper, except it's 4/4 and isn't legendary. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Hexstone
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a charge counter on Hexstone.
{T}, Sacrifice Hexstone: Choose a nonland permanent type. Destroy each permanent of the chosen type with mana value less than or equal to the number of charge counters on Hexstone.

cards.flavor: “Quickly now and mind your head.”
cards.name: Hideaway Agent
cards.text: When Hideaway Agent enters, gain control of target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less for as long as you control Hideaway Agent.

cards.flavor:
“Looks like it goes on for miles. Gonna scooch a little further in and if you don't hear from me in five, send help.”
—Timothy Lamb, last words
cards.name: Horrid Crawlspace
cards.text: No more than two creatures can attack each combat.

cards.name: Ivy Kissinger, Sharpshooter
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
Whenever Ivy Kissinger, Sharpshooter attacks, choose a creature you control. For each kind of counter among creatures you control, you may put a counter of that kind on the chosen creature.

cards.flavor: Neither foul magic nor godless machine is permitted in his woods.
cards.name: Keeper of the Ancient Ways
cards.text: When Keeper of the Ancient Ways enters, destroy up to three target noncreature, nonland artifacts and/or enchantments with total mana value 3 or less.

cards.flavor: “Above. Below. It matters not; there is no escape.”
cards.name: Keepers of the Reach
cards.text:
{T}: Keepers of the Reach deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{2}{R}, {T}: Keepers of the Reach deals 3 damage to each opponent. Activate only if you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater.

cards.flavor: “Every night, I'd go to sleep, vivid dreams stirring my imagination. Now, even the thought of closing my eyes fills me with dread.”
cards.name: Lisa Ward, Dreams of Madness
cards.text: Once each turn, when another creature you control dies, you may create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a Treasure artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.” (It loses its other types.)

cards.flavor: Is it your skin crawling or theirs?
cards.name: Marrowskitter
cards.text:
Marrowskitter can't block and can't be blocked.
{3}{B}{B}: Return Marrowskitter from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a token that's a copy of it.

cards.flavor: “Have we met?”
cards.name: Memories Rewound
cards.text:
When Memories Rewound enters, you may put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
{1}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Activate only once during each of your turns.

cards.flavor: “The solution is here somewhere, I just know it.”
cards.name: Meridian Mills, Seeking Answers
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw three cards.
You can't cast more than one spell each turn.

cards.name: Molting Abomination
cards.text:
Molting Abomination can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Whenever Molting Abomination deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a tapped 3/2 colorless Horror creature token. Put a stun counter on that token. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

cards.name: Mouthpiece of Yhzag
cards.text:
When Mouthpiece of Yhzag enters, you may have target opponent create a tapped 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
Whenever Mouthpiece of Yhzag attacks, gain control of target Human creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Tap it. It's attacking.

cards.name: Nathaniel O'Brien
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
[0]: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. If you have an insight counter, return that permanent card to the battlefield instead.
[0]: You get an insight counter.
[-1]: Target creature can't attack or block until your next turn.

cards.name: Nightmare Alley
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of Nightmare Alley.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor:
“Let's give them hell.”
—Nathaniel O'Brien
cards.name: Not Without a Fight
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, create a tapped 1/1 colorless Human creature token.
Whenever you attack, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.

cards.name: Planar Rift
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}. Put your choice of a flying, first strike, menace, trample, vigilance, or +1/+1 counter on Planar Rift.
{1}, {T}: Remove any number of counters from Planar Rift: Add {C} for each counter removed this way.
{T}: Move a counter from Planar Rift onto target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor:
“It's hard to tell whose side he's on; the man has an insatiable appetite for the forbidden.”
—Nathaniel O'Brien
cards.name: Professor Henrick Crawford
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{3}{U}, {T}: Copy target spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

cards.name: Rattlecage Terror
cards.text:
Rattlecage Terror enters tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Rattlecage Terror from your graveyard to your hand. When you do, another target creature card with mana value 3 or less in your graveyard gains this activated ability until end of turn, except it costs {1} more to activate.

cards.flavor: They tore at the world, and the world bled.
cards.name: Reality Collapse
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Reality Collapse deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Reality Collapse deals that much damage to target creature that player controls.

cards.flavor: It's hard to tell if the experiment was a success.
cards.name: Reckless Mutationist
cards.text:
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a Human: Create a token that's a copy of the sacrificed creature, except it's a 3/2 colorless Horror. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: The chanting grew louder, the earth trembled; they both knew what would happen next.
cards.name: Ritual Preparations
cards.text:
As Ritual Preparations enters, choose a color.
You don't lose unspent mana of the chosen color as steps and phases end.

cards.name: Rova, the Fleshweaver
cards.text:
Once each turn, when Rova, the Fleshweaver enters or you attack with one or more Horrors, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Then if Rova isn't a token, untap each land you control. Until your next turn, you may cast permanent spells as though they had flash.
{2}{G}{G}, Discard Rova: Create a token that's a copy of Rova, the Fleshweaver, except it's 4/4 and isn't legendary. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Rowena Bishop
cards.text:
[+1]: Tap target permanent. Put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
[0]: Put target artifact, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you have an insight counter, you may return that card to your hand instead.
[0]: You get an insight counter.
[-1]: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Until end of turn, whenever that creature deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card.

cards.flavor: A burst of speed, an ounce of precision, and a lack of self preservation make for a powerful cocktail.
cards.name: Run & Gun
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, Run & Gun deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of tapped creatures you control.

cards.name: Runebound Disciple
cards.text:
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells with mana value 5 or greater or to activate abilities of permanents or permanent cards with mana value 5 or greater.
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor: “There's a hot meal and bed waiting for you and a length of steel for any creature foolish enough to disturb us.”
cards.name: Safehouse Caretaker
cards.text:
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{1}{W}, {T}: Tap or untap another target creature.

cards.flavor: “I see nothing wrong with taking some shortcuts in life.”
cards.name: Scarlett Gallagher, Postmaster
cards.text:
Prowess, haste
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast noncreature spells with mana value 3 or less.

cards.name: Screams from the Deep
cards.text:
When Screams from the Deep enters, exile up to one target monocolored permanent.
As long as an opponent owns three or more cards in exile, you may have Screams from the Deep assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
Evoke {5} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Sealed Archives
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap an untapped artifact, creature, or land you control: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Choose a card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you may sacrifice Sealed Archives and draw a card.

cards.name: Sepulchral Guide
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Sepulchral Guide attacks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to another target creature you control this turn. If that creature has two or more counters on it, untap it.

cards.flavor: “Embrace the change.”
cards.name: Shed the Corporeal Form
cards.text: Create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token. Put your choice of a flying, vigilance, prowess, or hexproof counter on it. If you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, instead put any number of those counters and a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Sire of the Shapeless

rulings.text: Sire of the Shapeless will remain revealed until the activated ability is removed from the stack. If it leaves your hand before that happens, it will stop being revealed and won’t be shuffled into your library. You will still shuffle your library and create the token.

cards.text:
Sire of the Shapeless costs {3} less to cast as long as you control three or more creatures.
Trample, haste
{G}, Reveal Sire of the Shapeless from your hand: Create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token. Shuffle Sire of the Shapeless into your library. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: “There's no such thing as a question best left unanswered.”
cards.name: Solomon Rivers, Arcane Dabbler
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {2} or 2 life. If they don't, they return a permanent they control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Soul Reader
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target nonland permanent you own. If Soul Reader has two or more counters on it, return that card to the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, return that card to your hand.

cards.name: Stillmarsh Brinecatcher
cards.text:
When Stillmarsh Brinecatcher enters, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control a permanent with mana value 5 or greater, you may sacrifice Stillmarsh Brinecatcher. If you do, draw a card and create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token.

cards.flavor: “I'm sure those imbeciles up in Stoneport can dig up whatever you've got scribbled on that grocery list, but they'll never find you anything quite like this.”
cards.name: Stillmarsh Smuggler
cards.text: If you would draw a card, you may skip that draw. If you do, create a tapped Treasure token and exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

cards.name: Stoneport Provisioner
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
{3}{W}: Return target nonland permanent card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand. This ability cost {1} less to activate for each counter on Stoneport Provisioner.

cards.name: Streetwise Investigator
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control with mana value 3 or less can't be blocked this turn. If Streetwise Investigator has two or more counters on it, that creature gains vigilance until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Don't bother contacting our friends at the Order; I doubt even they could do anything for them now.”
—Nathaniel O'Brien
cards.name: Temeration
cards.text: Destroy target creature with mana value 2 or less. If it was a token, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Moonlit nights are not celebrated on Duncaster.
cards.name: The Duncaster Terror
cards.text:
Flying, menace
Whenever another creature you control deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it.
If you would draw a card, you may instead return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: The Pactbinder's Cane

cards.flavor: “Our masters deserve only the finest meals.”
cards.id: The Servant in the Ivory Mask_TMI
cards.imageName: the servant in the ivory mask
cards.name: The Servant in the Ivory Mask
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature. Put a sacrifice counter on it.
Creature tokens you control with sacrifice counters on them can't attack or block and have “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”

cards.name: Theodore Harper, Head Librarian
cards.text:
As Theodore Harper, Head Librarian enters, choose Fact or Fiction.
• Fact — Permanent spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana a spell costs to cast to less than one mana.
• Fiction — When Theodore Harper enters, return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Tome of the Lidless Gaze
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with Tome of the Lidless Gaze to its owner's graveyard.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Eyes, create a token that's a copy of a card exiled with Tome of the Lidless Gaze except it's a 2/2 Eye Horror with flying in addition to its other types.

cards.flavor:
“You're as likely to escape it as you are to escape your own shadow.”
—Darren Hunter
cards.name: Umbral Hunter
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{R}{R}{R}: Return Umbral Hunter from your graveyard to your hand. If it's the declare attackers step, up to one target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “With the guards dead, you could say I'm doing my part in preserving our city's history.”
cards.name: Unguarded Relics
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a Treasure token. If you do, an opponent of your choice creates a tapped Treasure token.

cards.flavor: Every night he leads rescued civilians to safety, never realizing what he's done.
cards.name: Unwitting Fanatic
cards.text:
When Unwitting Fanatic enters, create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token.
Sacrifice Unwitting Fanatic: Another target permanent you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Vedu, the Deepdrinker
cards.text:
Once each turn, when Vedu, the Deepdrinker enters or you attack with one or more Horrors, you may tap up to two target permanents. If Vedu isn't a token, put two stun counters on each of those permanents.
{2}{U}{U}, Discard Vedu: Create a token that's a copy of Vedu, the Deepdrinker, except it's 4/4 and isn't legendary. Activate only as a sorcery.

changes: 2024-10-01 — Was 3/4 with "Once each turn, when Vile Progenitor or a land you control enters, create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token." and "Whenever Vile Progenitor attacks, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn."
cards.name: Vile Progenitor
cards.text:
When Vile Progenitor enters, create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token.
As long as you control five or more lands, Horrors you control get +1/+1 and have trample.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.flavor: “ I see it! I see it! N'gha! N'gha!”
cards.name: Visions of the End
cards.text: Target player mills a card. Create a 3/2 colorless Horror creature token. Put a decayed counter on it. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

cards.name: Voracious Spawn
cards.text: Whenever Voracious Spawn enters or attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If you exile a permanent card, put a +1/+1 counter on Voracious Spawn. If you exile a  nonpermanent card, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: “The plants within these woods shows signs of harvest, yet none are fit for human consumption. This begs the question; what are they fit for?”
cards.name: Fleshweaver's Domain
cards.text:
Fleshweaver's Domain enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.

cards.flavor: The Order of the Eternitarian Soul protects what they can, but even they aren't infallible.
cards.name: Ward of Seclusion
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, that player may exile a card from their graveyard and pay {2}. If the player doesn't, creatures they control can't attack you or planeswalkers you control this turn.

cards.flavor: It wears your face; or at least, the best attempt it can make at it.
cards.name: Warped Physiognomist
cards.text: You may have Warped Physiognomist enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield with mana value 3 or less.

cards.flavor: Some bodies are meant to stay missing.
cards.name: What Remains of Samuel Quinn
cards.text:
You may cast What Remains of Samuel Quinn from your graveyard and from the battlefield. It costs {G}{G} more to cast this way.
What Remains of Samuel Quinn enters with your choice of X counters from among +1/+1, vigilance, reach, and trample.

cards.flavor: “Cheat me like that again and I'll fix more than just your ride, scurf.”
cards.name: Whitney Banks, Ace Mechanic
cards.text:
Improve {1} ({1}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)
Other creatures you control have improve {1}.

cards.flavor: In the darkest hour, you'll wish you were alone.
cards.name: Within Midnight's Nexus
cards.text: If a permanent you control with mana value 5 or greater entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

cards.flavor: Progenitor, destroyer; the terrible truth made manifest.
cards.name: Yhzag, Alpha and Omega
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a spell from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.
When Yhzag, Alpha and Omega is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.
